lines: 335TUYA KUSEKA CIFUMOFUMOWE WILL SMILE IN THE MORNING
Mweenzu obombede buka, Tuya kuseka cifumo;
Leza wamba mwijwi lyakwe, Tuya kuseka cifumo.
Kuseka kuya kuboola, Kuseka kuya ku boola,
Antela tuya kulila masiku, Tuya kuseka cifumo.
Mutayowi bana Jesu, Tuya kuseka cifumo;
Mulange mujulu inywe, Tuya kuseka cifumo;
Misozi iya kusindwa, Tuya kuseka cifumo,
Kupenga kuya kumana, Tuya kuseka cifumo.
